      void dec() 
      int getBPM() 
      int getMeasure() 
      void inc() 
      void setBPM(int bpm)
      Sets the BPM value and executes BeatsChangedCmd command to update related JavaFX's Text component If the isRunning flag is true then the tick method will be executed periodically with the new bpm
      void setMeasure(int measure)
      Sets the Measure value and executes MeasureChangedCmd command to update related JavaFX's Text component
      void setRunning(boolean flag)
      Sets the running flag to perform the tick method whether the flag is true.
      void tick()
      Executes the BpmEventCmd and BarEventCmd periodically
